alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nueces; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 11:41AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nueces County through 1215 PM CDT... At 1141 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Padre Balli Park, or 16 miles southeast of Corpus Christi, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corpus Christi, Flour Bluff, Packery Channel, Padre Balli Park, Waldron Field, Mustang Island State Park and Corpus Christi Naval Air Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nueces; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
